Ukiyo-e

We are proud to present a distinctive collection that brings the vibrant tones and bold lines of Ukiyo-e prints to everyday wear. Don’t miss this opportunity to sport iconic Ukiyo-e works from Hokusai, Hiroshige, and Kuniyoshi, three of Japan’s greatest Ukiyo-e masters.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Anime JUJUTSU KAISEN Season 2

This collection will feature the "Hidden Inventory/Premature Death" arc that reveals the past of Satoru Gojo and Suguru Geto, and the "Shibuya Incident" arc continuing the timeline from the first season. Beloved characters and iconic scenes from the series are incorporated in the designs of the graphic t-shirts.

© Gege Akutami/Shueisha, JUJUTSU KAISEN Project
items.name: JUJUTSU KAISEN UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The TV anime series depicts the battle between curses born from negative emotions of humans and the Jujutsu sorcerers who exorcize them through sorcery.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
This design features the 5 characters from the 104th training corps who inherit the Titans power. Eren as "Attack Titan", Annie as “Female Titan”, Reiner as” Armored Titan”, Bertolt as”Colossus Titan” and Ymir as “Jaw Titan” Also, this design is inspired by the story which each characters have different thoughts and they fight with their own thoughts.

Attack on Titan

The popular manga series written and illustrated by Hajime Isayama was serialized in “Bessatsu Shonen Magazine” from 2009 to 2021, the cumulative circulation has exceeded 110 million copies worldwide, and it continues to create shock waves not only in Japan but also around the world. These UT are inspired by this manga which captures the reader’s attention with a world where humanity is forced to live in cities surrounded by enormous “walls” that protect them from gigantic man-eating humanoids referred to as Titans, and “Vertical maneuvering equipment” developed to combat the Titan.

©Hajime Isayama/KODANSHA Ltd.
items.name: Attack on Titan UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The MANGA “Attack on Titan” Humanity vs. Titans. A superb collection befitting the conclusion of this turbulent story.

items.longDescription:
It’s time to celebrate the reunion of the beloved UNIQLO x Marimekko limited-edition collection, enriching the humble pleasure of cozy dressing just in time for a joyful 2024 New Year. It offers head-to-toe warmth with UNIQLO’s winter signatures of soft fleeces and functional HEATTECH featuring Marimekko's world-renowned prints: Kivet (stones), Kissapöllö, and Seireeni by Maija Isola, along with Hattara by Pentti Rinta.

- A light and casual shoulder bag.
- Shaped to fit the body for active use.
- Conveniently sized to hold a smartphone or long wallet.
- Added piping helps the bag keep its shape.
- Handy inner pocket for your keys or smartphone.
- Gender neutral design.
- Clothing using recycled materials is part of our effort to support the reduction of waste and use of new materials. Ratios of recycled material vary by item. Please check “Materials” on the price tag or care label for details.
*Please note that pattern placement may differ from the photo. Your understanding is appreciated.

items.longDescription:
Sanrio characters

The Sanrio characters, especially Kuromi, who is popular for her devilish cuteness, have been gaining traction as fashion icons. This collection is sweet, spicy and easy to wear, incorporating elements of gothic and lolita fashion emblematic of Harajuku, the cultural center of Japan.

© 2023 SANRIO CO., LTD. APPROVAL NO. L643879

The Sanrio characters, especially Kuromi, who is popular for her devilish cuteness, have been gaining traction as fashion icons. This collection is sweet, spicy and easy to wear, incorporating elements of gothic and lolita fashion emblematic of Harajuku, the cultural center of Japan.

© 2023 SANRIO CO., LTD. APPROVAL NO. L643879

items.longDescription:
A collection by Clare Waight Keller, who brings effortless sophistication to the high-quality daily essentials of LifeWear. Timeless pieces are reimagined with both oversized and fluid silhouettes in modern fabrics for an elevated everyday.

- Flowing chiffon fabric.
- Wrinkle-resistant fabric.
- Elastic waist design for easy outfit changes.
- Fine pleats from the waist to the hips, with wider pleats toward the hem.
- Sleek fit around the waist with a gentle flare at the hem.
- Exquisite paisley print.
- We support the reduction of waste and of oil consumption. Clothing made using recycled polyester is part of this effort.
Ratios of recycled polyester vary by item. Please check “Materials” for details.

items.longDescription:
- A powder-soft shell made using Toray’s unique NANODESIGN™ technology, generously filled with premium down for incredible comfort that feels like you’re wrapped in a cloud. *‘NANODESIGN™’ technology was developed by Toray to harness the full potential of textiles at the nano level.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured using the IDFB method.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Anti-static lining.
- Made with fine thread for a light feel.
- Sophisticated design with concealed slide fastener.
- Dot buttons mean you can wear it without closing the slide fastener.
- Elastic and stoppers allow the hem to be cinched in to create a rounded silhouette.

items.shortDescription: The ultimate in softness using NANODESIGN™ technology. Premium down is warm and lightweight.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.
